alert.note: Alert for Hansford; Hutchinson; Moore; Sherman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 31 at 4:52PM CDT until May 31 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Hutchinson County in the Panhandle of Texas... Southwestern Hansford County in the Panhandle of Texas... Southeastern Sherman County in the Panhandle of Texas... Eastern Moore County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 451 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles southeast of Dumas, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect some tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Stinnett and Pringle. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
